Class Quiz

  • java.lang.Object
    • Quiz
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Quiz
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    The Quiz Class is for reading in the text file of questions and creating quizzes for the user.

      • showQuiz

        public java.lang.String showQuiz​(java.awt.Graphics g,
                                 Player p,
                                 Background b)
        If all questions have been used, each question is reset to haven not been chosen. A random question is chosen until one that has not been chosen yet is picked. The quiz is displayed on screen.
        Parameters:
        g - the graphics of the view
        p - current player
        b - current background
        Returns:
        the string text
